oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oplæg om økologisk sortsudvikling
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Borgen, Anders
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
Recycling, balancing and resource management
Markets and trade
Values, standards and certification
Biodiversity and ecosystem services
Breeding, genetics and propagation
Crop health, quality, protection
Policy environments and social economy
Produce chain management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Rapporten diskuterer den aktuelle situation for sortsanvendelsen i økologisk landbrug og for perspektiverne for økologisk planteforædling.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Borgen, Anders (2010) Oplæg om økologisk sortsudvikling. Working paper, Økologisk Landsforening. [Completed]
